rationale: The intensifier 'highly' modifies the risk-adjective 'contagious'. The technical-term guard does not apply as 'virus' is not a specific strain name.
statement_text: The U.S. Department of Agriculture said all 1.35 million chickens on the farm in Ohioâ€™s Union County will be slaughtered to help limit the spread of the highly contagious virus after a case was confirmed in the flock this week.
